**Advanced Topic**
It is possible to write Java or Scala UDFs.
One example can be found at https://github.com/javierluraschi/sparklyudf

Be sure to read the documentation on extensions https://spark.rstudio.com/extensions/

Advantages: no R <-> JVM serialization overhead, still not optimized by catalyst unless custom catalyst optimization rules have been created.
